Package xxl.functions

Provides Functions, Predicates and Procedures as well as higher-order Functions.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ComparableAdapter A class that adapts Comparable-Objects.
 

Class Summary
AbstractComparableAdapter A Predicate that adapts Comparable-Objects.
And The logical And-Predicate.
ArrayFactory A Factory-method for Object-typed-arrays.
BinaryPredicate A Predicate that decorates two input-Predicates (higher-order Predicate).
Constant A Constant is a Function that returns a constant value.
DecoratorFunction A DecoratorFunction decorates (wraps) a Function.
DecoratorPredicate A DecoratorPredicate decorates (wraps) a Predicate.
Equal A binary Predicate that returns true if two input-references are equal.
Equals A binary Predicate that returns true if argument1.equals(argument2) holds.
For A (recursive) Functional For-loop.
Function In Java, there is no direct support for the declaration of functional types and functional variables.This deficiency is eliminated by the class Function.
FunctionPredicate Wrapper for Functions to Predicate.
Functions This class contains some useful static methods for manipulating Function-Objects.
Greater A binary Predicate that returns true if argument1 > argument2 holds.
GreaterEqual A binary Predicate that returns true if argument1 >= argument2 holds.
Iff A Functional If-statement (like ?:-operator).
IntegerIncrement A Function that expects an Integer-Object as its input and returns the increment.
LeftBind The LeftBind-Predicate binds the left argument of a binary Predicate to a constant-Object.
Less The binary Predicate Less returns true if argument1 < argument2 holds.
LessEqual The binary Predicate LessEqual returns true if argument1 <= argument2 holds.
Not The logical Not-Predicate.
Or The logical Or-Predicate.
Predicate A Predicate takes zero, one, two or an Object-array as its argument and returns a primitive boolean.
PredicateFunction A Wrapper for Predicates to Function.
PredicateProjection A PredicateProjection applies a Projection to the argument of a given Predicate.
Println The Println-Function prints the argument to standard out.
Procedure A functional Procedure that implements Runnable, useful for multithreaded stuff.
Projection A Projection projects an input array-argument to a "sub"-array of arguments.
RightBind The RightBind-Predicate binds the right argument of a binary Predicate to a constant-Object.
Tuplify Maps 0,1 or 2 arguments to a tuple (=Object[2]).
Xor The logical Xor-Predictae.
 

Package xxl.functions Description

Provides Functions, Predicates and Procedures as well as higher-order Functions.
